page.title: 16HOLMESFIELD CRICKET CLUB
page.content: The present Holmesfield cricket club was started in 1930. Their first ground was near to the Robin Hood public house in Holmesfield. After 1960 they moved to Millthorpe. They have won the league title three times. The highest score they have ever reached is 270 for 3. Once a man collected 10 wickets in one game. The first captain of the present Holmesfield cricket team was C.Rose. They used to have an under 16's team but there is now nobody to take the team. The first team plays in{North {Derbyshire League}. The second team only plays friendly matches. Most of the cricketers live in Holmesfield, but there is one from Chesterfield, and two from Dronfield. So far this season they have played 20 league matches. The first team is top of the third division of the league.
